attributes.action: Develop a clear policy to account for the changes in societies needs to accomodate increasing life spans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the government to generate an all inclusive integrated plan for the required changes in society caused by increasing life spans.
This should include:
Care Homes,
Pensions both private and state,
Fitness and health plans,
disabled facilities in all planning permisissions including domestic housing.
Medical screening to prevent age related illnesses.
Consideration give to financial aid to councils who have a high average age in their community
